Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Introduction and Personal Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of Ghost Town and the initial conflicts: a romantic dispute between Nan and Cal, and the impending threat of an airport construction that will destroy the town.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Quarrel and Cowboy's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the initial romantic conflict between the woman in the green hat (Nan) and the cowboy (Cal) in Ghost Town, leading to the cowboy's frustrated departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Girl from Ghost Town and Initial Conflict

sub_scenes.title: Surveyors' Arrival and Airport Announcement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the surveyors and the airport plan, revealing the external threat to Ghost Town and escalating the conflict beyond personal relationships.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Surveyors and the Airport Plan
Cowboy's Shock and the Impending Destruction of Ghost Town

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Misunderstanding and Nan's Exit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene continues the personal conflict between Nan and Cal, focusing on their romantic misunderstandings and Nan's departure, setting a melancholic tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstanding and Parting
Nan's Reflection on Love and Past Hurt

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Humiliation and Community Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Nan's emotional turmoil after her argument with Cal and the businessmen, her humiliation by her father, and the emerging community crisis of the severe snowstorm.

sub_scenes.title: Threat and Rejection by Rough Men
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a threatening encounter with rough men, highlighting the growing discontent and danger in Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Rough Men and Discontent with 'Progress'

sub_scenes.title: Businessmen's Dismissal and Father's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's attempt to engage with businessmen and her subsequent humiliation and scolding by her father, emphasizing her isolation and emotional distress.

narrative_arcs.title: Businessmen Discuss Airport and Horses, Nan Interjects

sub_scenes.title: Comfort and Resolve Amidst Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Nan receiving comfort from her mother and maid, gaining resolve regarding Cal, and then facing the onset of a severe snowstorm.

narrative_arcs.title: Mother and Maid Console Nan About Cal

sub_scenes.title: Final Disagreement and Approaching Winter Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Nan and Cal's final disagreement before his departure, followed by Nan's loneliness and Cal's unexpected return, culminating in the arrival of the severe winter storm.

sub_scenes.title: Community Worry and Cal's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the community's growing anxiety over the snowstorm and the threat to livestock, leading to Cal's decisive action to help.

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson and Rising Town Tension
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the town's varied reactions to him, along with the escalating despair and hope during the snowstorm.

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Faint Hope During Snowstorm
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene captures the town's despair over the relentless snowfall and a faint glimmer of hope.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: Arrival of the Plane and Fodder

sub_scenes.title: Reflection on Romance and Chane Benson's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a personal reflection between Nan and Cal post-crisis, and then introduces Chane Benson and the initial town reactions to his dramatic arrival.

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Hero Worship and Sister's Concern
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene delves into Jeff's past hero worship of his father and his sister's present-day concern over his unhealthy obsession and potential for violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing About Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship
Justifying Actions with Clyde Surrett's Example
Dismissing Chane Benson and Embracing Violence

Major_Arcs.title: Clyde & Benson Conflict and Newspaper's Role
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the escalating conflict between Clyde and Chane Benson, and the role of Sally and the Clarion newspaper in mediating and confronting this tension.

sub_scenes.title: Sister's Hopelessness and Plea to Clyde
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays the sister's despair over Jeff's path and her desperate plea to Clyde for help.

narrative_arcs.title: Expressing Fear and Seeking Help from Clyde
Declaration of Love and Duty Towards Jeff
Reassurance and Promise of Shared Happiness

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Introduction of Mr. Benson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene marks Jeff's disappearance and the introduction of Mr. Benson, setting up new plot developments and character interactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Disappearance and Pursuit to Town
Introduction of Mr. Benson and Seeking Advice
Chane Benson's Menacing Demeanor and Disdain for Young Boys

sub_scenes.title: Article Controversy and Editor's Stand
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene revolves around the controversy sparked by an article about Benson, his threats, and the Editor's decision to stand against him.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article and Benson's Threat
Warning about Benson's Cunning and Cowardice
Seeking Action from the Editor and Decision to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Strategic Considerations and Dinner Invitation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers strategic considerations for dealing with Benson and the unexpected turn towards inviting him to dinner.

narrative_arcs.title: Clyde's Unwavering Resolve and Benson's Character
Shifting Opinions and Dinner Invitation Idea

Major_Arcs.title: Escalation and Rescue Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the aftermath of the dinner with Benson, leading to escalating conflict, a physical fight, and a desperate rescue mission to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.title: Moonlight Confrontation and Forced Kiss
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene describes the morning after the dinner, Chane's manipulative charm under moonlight, and the escalating confrontation between Jeff, Sally, and Chane.

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Chase, and Clyde's Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the physical fight between Jeff and Chane, Sally's warning about Clyde, the race to rescue him, and Clyde's eventual capture by Benson's men.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight, Warning, and Race to Rescue Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and Ranch Setting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the aftermath of Clyde's capture, the newspaper's reaction, and transitions to a new setting at a ranch, introducing new characters and conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Newspaper Production
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a flashback to the Clarion office, followed by the efforts to produce the next edition of the newspaper despite the crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and New Boss Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a ranch setting, introducing a physical confrontation and the arrival of Steve Daley as the new 'boss'.

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of Steve and Ranch Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the initial interactions with Steve Daley at the Double B ranch, revealing ranch problems and Betsy's complicated past with Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Management and Bunk Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts initial ranch management discussions and Betsy showing Steve to his bunk, establishing their dynamic.

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Defense and Ranch Troubles Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Hank defending his decision to hire Steve and Betsy revealing the ranch's ongoing problems and need for caution.

sub_scenes.title: Buckboard Ride and Town Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Betsy and Steve's buckboard ride to town, including Betsy's reflections and their arrival, along with a separate scene of Hank giving orders.

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy & Steve Romance and Ranch Conflict Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the escalating tension in town, Betsy's assertive actions, the development of romance with Steve, and the climax of the ranch conflict with Bridges.

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Slap
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts town gossip about Betsy, her confrontation with men, and the immediate physical retaliation.

sub_scenes.title: Bodyguard Confirmation and Hank's Plea
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene confirms Steve as Betsy's bodyguard, followed by Hank's anxious plea to keep his job, revealing his deeper feelings for Betsy and the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Hank's Job Secured and Gratitude Expressed

sub_scenes.title: Gun Condition, Choice, and Romantic Turn
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Betsy setting conditions for Steve's job, offering him a choice, and then having a sudden romantic change of heart.

narrative_arcs.title: Clarification and Choice about Gunfighter Role
Betsy's Change of Heart and Plea to Stay

sub_scenes.title: Bridges Confrontation and Declaration of War
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Old Man Bridges' arrival and confrontation with Betsy, escalating into threats and a declaration of war.

narrative_arcs.title: Analysis of the Confrontation as a Declaration of War
Betsy's Assertion of Authority and Gun Ownership
Steve's Reflection, Flashback to Ambush, and Hank's Fate

sub_scenes.title: Steve's Departure and Betsy's Pursuit to Devil's Pass
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Steve's determined departure to Devil's Pass, Betsy's contemplation, and her decision to pursue him into danger.

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Confrontation and Betsy's Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the arrival at Devil's Pass, the tense confrontation, and Betsy's dramatic shooting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Reunion, and Romantic Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of Betsy's shooting, her survival, reunion with Steve, and a romantic resolution amidst the danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Survival and Reunion with Steve

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie, Dave, and Fred - Love Triangle and Business
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new set of characters and relationships, focusing on the complex dynamics between Carrie, Dave, and Fred, and the business dealings related to the ranch.

sub_scenes.title: Argument about Dave and Curley's Actions
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces an argument about Dave and raises questions about Curley's unexpected actions, setting up new conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Territorial Dispute with Bar Fenin Ranch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a territorial dispute with the new owners of the Bar Fenin ranch, adding a new layer of external conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Trouble with Bar Fenin Ranch Buyers

sub_scenes.title: Fence Issue and Fred Gordon's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the fence issue causing water access problems and Fred Gordon's arrival and confrontational stance.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussing the Fence and Range Issues
Fred Gordon's Confrontation at the Fence

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Reconciliation, and Intimate Reflection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Carrie's apology to Dave, their reconciliation, and then shifts to a more intimate conversation and Carrie's internal reflections on her feelings for Dave and Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Intimate Conversation and Reflection on Fred

sub_scenes.title: Fred Gordon's Ominous Reappearance and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Fred Gordon's unexpected and ominous reappearance, leading to a direct confrontation with Carrie.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Resolution and Carlton Contract Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene brings romantic resolution for Carrie and Dave, but immediately introduces a new plot point concerning the Carlton contract and Fred's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Misunderstandings and Romantic Resolution

Major_Arcs.title: Contract Resolution and Carrie's Choice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on the Carlton contract, Carrie's realization of Fred's manipulation, her confrontation with Dave, and her ultimate choice regarding her future and relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Determination Against Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie angrily confronting Dave, accusing him of betrayal, and then resolving to take action against Fred.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Inquiry with Dave and Fred

sub_scenes.title: Carlton's Office Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie and Fred's arrival at Carlton's office, their confrontation, and the eventual resolution orchestrated by Carrie's father.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Interruption at Carlton's Office
Carlton's Business History and Carrie's Resolution

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Independence and Final Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Carrie's declaration of independence, her encounter with Dave, and her final emotional choice regarding her future.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Independence and Western Identity
Anger, Apology, and Question of Love
Father's Wisdom and Long Ride Home
Accusation of Heartbreak and Eastern Trickery

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Realization and Romantic Reunion with Fred
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Carrie's realization of her true feelings, her misunderstanding about Fred's actions, and her eventual romantic reunion with him.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Dave's Words and Embracing Love

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Chris - Escape and Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dirk and Chris, focusing on Dirk's desperate escape, the pursuit by Rance, and the escalating tension of the chase.

sub_scenes.title: Desperate Plea and True Injury Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dirk's desperate plea to Chris and quickly reveals the true severity of his injury - a gunshot wound.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation Plan and Mistaken Identity
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the older man planning to investigate Dirk's situation and Chris Ransom's arrival at the ranch, leading to mistaken identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Search and Blood Stained Pinto

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Duty Regarding Dirk
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on a confrontation about Dirk's actions and the badge-wearing man's insistence on his duty to arrest Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: Reunion, Resignation, and Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to Dirk and Chris's reunion, a tone of resignation, and Chris's confession of love for Rance.

sub_scenes.title: Mutual Declaration and Determined Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Chris and Rance's mutual declaration of love and their determined plan to chase after Dirk.

sub_scenes.title: The Chase, Confrontation, and Shooting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the relentless chase, the eventual confrontation between Rance and Dirk, and the critical moment of shooting.

sub_scenes.title: Moral Dilemma and Difficult Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene deals with the moral dilemma after the shooting and the difficult decision of Chris and Dirk to leave Rance behind.

narrative_arcs.title: The Difficult Departure and Lingering Feelings

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Reconciliations and Dirk's Capture
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with romantic reconciliations between Chris and Rance, Dirk's escape and eventual fate, and the wedding.

sub_scenes.title: Chris's Return and Rance's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Chris returning to Rance, her confession of love, and Rance's recovery after being brought back to the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Mutual Feelings and Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene on the wedding day, with preparations underway and Dirk's dramatic and unexpected arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Chris's Concern and Rance's Reassurance about Dirk

sub_scenes.title: Marshal's Trap and Dirk's Fate Revealed
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the Marshal's perspective, revealing the planned trap for Dirk and the ultimate fate of Dirk and his brother.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marshal's Appreciation and Wedding Gift

sub_scenes.title: Final Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a final romantic climax and resolution for Carrie and Fred.
